document_data.name: Bloodspear
document_data.Effects:
''Bloodspear'' allowed its caster to touch a [[spear]], Gruumsh's favored weapon, and instill the god's anger into it, turning it into a ''[[wounding (weapon quality)|wounding]] spear''. The [[magic]] caused the spear tip to ooze blood. 

This spell expired 6 seconds after the spear left the caster's hand. Therefore, the spear could be thrown and still harm the target with the ''wounding'' quality.
document_data.History: ''Bloodspear'' was only available for clerics of Gruumsh and even among them only to those who were initiated in the faith's secrets.
